scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run stylelint
scripts.lint:fix: npm run eslint -- --fix && npm run stylelint -- --fix
scripts.format: npm run prettier:fix && npm run lint:fix
scripts.review: npm run lint && npm run tsc
scripts.dev: npm run generate-browser-support && webpack serve --config webpack.config.dev.js --env target=$npm_config_target
scripts.generate-api: rm -rf src/api/generated/* && openapi-generator-cli version-manager set 5.4.0 && openapi-generator-cli generate -c openapi.config.json -i src/api/definition/api.yaml -g typescript-fetch -o src/api/generated && rm -rf src/api/generated/.openapi-generator src/api/generated/.openapi-generator-ignore api.temp.ts openapitools.json && npm run disable-type-check-for-generated-code mono
scripts.generate-price-api: rm -rf src/api/generated-price/* && openapi-generator-cli version-manager set 5.4.0 && openapi-generator-cli generate -c openapi.config.json -i src/api/definition/price-breakdown.yaml -g typescript-fetch -o src/api/generated-price && rm -rf src/api/generated-price/.openapi-generator src/api/generated-price/.openapi-generator-ignore api.temp.ts openapitools.json && npm run disable-type-check-for-generated-code price
scripts.update-api: npm run download-api && npm run generate-api
scripts.generate-rfq-api: rm -rf src/api/generated-rfq/* && openapi-generator-cli version-manager set 5.4.0 && openapi-generator-cli generate -c openapi.config.json -i src/api/definition/rfq-api.yaml -g typescript-fetch -o src/api/generated-rfq && rm -rf src/api/generated-rfq/.openapi-generator src/api/generated-rfq/.openapi-generator-ignore api.temp.ts openapitools.json && npm run disable-type-check-for-generated-code rfq
scripts.update-rfq-api: npm run download-rfq-api && npm run generate-rfq-api
scripts.generate-auth-api: rm -rf src/api/generated-auth/* && openapi-generator-cli version-manager set 5.4.0 && openapi-generator-cli generate -c openapi.config.json -i src/api/definition/auth-api.yaml -g typescript-fetch -o src/api/generated-auth && rm -rf src/api/generated-auth/.openapi-generator src/api/generated-auth/.openapi-generator-ignore api.temp.ts openapitools.json && npm run disable-type-check-for-generated-code auth
scripts.generate-any-api: rm -rf "src/api/generated-$npm_config_api/*" && openapi-generator-cli version-manager set 5.4.0 && openapi-generator-cli generate -c openapi.config.json -i "src/api/definition/$npm_config_api-api.yaml" -g typescript-fetch -o "src/api/generated-$npm_config_api" && rm -rf "src/api/generated-$npm_config_api/.openapi-generator" "src/api/generated-$npm_config_api/.openapi-generator-ignore" api.temp.ts openapitools.json && npm run disable-type-check-for-generated-code "$npm_config_api"
scripts.update-auth-api: npm run download-auth-api && npm run generate-auth-api
scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run generate-browser-support && webpack --config webpack.config.prod.js
